==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=左将军|type=12}}

===Etymology===
General of the Left (along with General of the Right, Front and Rear) was usually picked based on abilities rather than family ties, and was directly subordinate to the central government.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=zuǒ jiāngjūn
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} ''General of the Left'' (a high [[military]] [[rank]] held by [[general]]s in ancient [[China]])
